Question.Subject: how do i get rid of this 'cookies' or enable cookies?
Question.Content:
this symbol has been on my browser for about a week and I don't know how to fix it...I've gone under options or whatever and enabled them, but it doesn't leave, how do I fix it?
----screen cap----
http://bit.ly/bTkHNL
*I use Google Chrome...
thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: 1 Click the Tools tools menu menu. 2 Select Options. 3 Click the Under the Hood tab. 4 Click Content settings in the "Privacy" section.

Answer.Content: 1 Click the Tools tools menu menu. 2 Select Options. 3 Click the Under the Hood tab. 4 Click Content settings in the "Privacy" section.
